title: Vegetable soup with herbs
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '4 carrots, peeled and cut into rounds', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '2 potatoes, peeled and diced', '2 leeks, cut into rounds', '1.5L water', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', 'salt and ground black pepper', 'extra fresh herbs for garnish']
